Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Budget tracking app

- Spring Boot backend with REST API
- Vue.js + Vuetify frontend
- PostgreSQL database integration
- Monthly and yearly budget views
- CRUD for sections and budget items

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add offline fallback with default sections

- Show default budget sections when backend is unreachable
- Display warning alert in offline mode
- Disable editing controls when offline
- Add isOffline state to budget store

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Liquibase and Docker for database management

- Add Liquibase dependency for database migrations
- Create changelog files for budget, section, budget_item tables
- Add Docker Compose for PostgreSQL container
- Update Hibernate to validate mode \(Liquibase manages schema\)
- Update documentation with Docker instructions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
